languages.text: "Мой... брат? Сородич? Как и {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}друкари{/g}, не причисляющий себя к Детям Азуриана. Вы, мон-кай, зовете ему подобных Арлекинами. Ибо они — память. Ибо они — забвенье. Долг Арлекинов — напоминать нашему народу, что, несмотря на разные Пути, наш враг един — {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Та, Что Жаждет{/g}. И среди Арлекинов нет более опасных и непредсказуемых созданий, чем Солитеры. Вся их жизнь — спектакль, в котором сплетены искусство выступления и искусство убийства".

traits.locale_text: "Мой... брат? Сородич? Как и {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}друкари{/g}, не причисляющий себя к Детям Азуриана. Вы, мон-кай, зовете ему подобных Арлекинами. Ибо они — память. Ибо они — забвенье. Долг Арлекинов — напоминать нашему народу, что, несмотря на разные Пути, наш враг един — {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Та, Что Жаждет{/g}. И среди Арлекинов нет более опасных и непредсказуемых созданий, чем Солитеры. Вся их жизнь — спектакль, в котором сплетены искусство выступления и искусство убийства".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "My... brother? My kin? Like the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, he is not one of the Children of Asuryan. You mon-keigh call those like him Harlequins. For they are memory. They are oblivion. It is the Harlequins' duty to remind our kind that, despite our differing Paths, we have but one enemy — {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g}. And among the Harlequins, there is no creature more unpredictable or perilous than the Solitaire. Their entire lives are a spectacle where the art of performance and the art of killing are intertwined."
languages.original_text: "Мой... брат? Сородич? Как и {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}друкари{/g}, не причисляющий себя к Детям Азуриана. Вы, мон-кай, зовете ему подобных Арлекинами. Ибо они — память. Ибо они — забвенье. Долг Арлекинов — напоминать нашему народу, что, несмотря на разные Пути, наш враг един — {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Та, Что Жаждет{/g}. И среди Арлекинов нет более опасных и непредсказуемых созданий, чем Солитеры. Вся их жизнь — спектакль, в котором сплетены искусство выступления и искусство убийства".

languages.text: “算是我的……兄弟？我的族人？他与{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}黑暗灵族{/g}一样，并不是阿苏焉的子嗣。你们猴子会称他们为丑角。他们既代表记忆，也代表遗忘。丑角的职责是提醒我们的族人，让我们想起尽管我们之间有诸多分歧，但我们共同的敌人只有一个，那就是{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}饥渴女士{/g}。而在所有丑角之中，‘独角’是最危险、最难以预料的家伙。他们的人生就像是一场奇景，交织着表演的艺术与杀戮的艺术。”
languages.original_text: "My... brother? My kin? Like the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, he is not one of the Children of Asuryan. You mon-keigh call those like him Harlequins. For they are memory. They are oblivion. It is the Harlequins' duty to remind our kind that, despite our differing Paths, we have but one enemy — {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g}. And among the Harlequins, there is no creature more unpredictable or perilous than the Solitaire. Their entire lives are a spectacle where the art of performance and the art of killing are intertwined."

traits.locale_text: “算是我的……兄弟？我的族人？他与{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}黑暗灵族{/g}一样，并不是阿苏焉的子嗣。你们猴子会称他们为丑角。他们既代表记忆，也代表遗忘。丑角的职责是提醒我们的族人，让我们想起尽管我们之间有诸多分歧，但我们共同的敌人只有一个，那就是{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}饥渴女士{/g}。而在所有丑角之中，‘独角’是最危险、最难以预料的家伙。他们的人生就像是一场奇景，交织着表演的艺术与杀戮的艺术。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «¿Mi... hermano? ¿De los míos? Al igual que los {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, no es uno de los hijos de Asuryan. Los mon-keigh llamáis a los que son como él Arlequines, pues son el recuerdo y el olvido. El deber de los Arlequines es recordar a nuestra especie que, a pesar de las Sendas que tomemos, todos tenemos un mismo enemigo: {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}la Sedienta{/g}. Y, entre los Arlequines, no hay criatura más impredecible ni peligrosa que el Solitario. Todas sus vidas son un espectáculo en el que el arte de la interpretación y el del asesinato se vuelven uno».
languages.original_text: "My... brother? My kin? Like the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, he is not one of the Children of Asuryan. You mon-keigh call those like him Harlequins. For they are memory. They are oblivion. It is the Harlequins' duty to remind our kind that, despite our differing Paths, we have but one enemy — {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g}. And among the Harlequins, there is no creature more unpredictable or perilous than the Solitaire. Their entire lives are a spectacle where the art of performance and the art of killing are intertwined."

traits.locale_text: «¿Mi... hermano? ¿De los míos? Al igual que los {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, no es uno de los hijos de Asuryan. Los mon-keigh llamáis a los que son como él Arlequines, pues son el recuerdo y el olvido. El deber de los Arlequines es recordar a nuestra especie que, a pesar de las Sendas que tomemos, todos tenemos un mismo enemigo: {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}la Sedienta{/g}. Y, entre los Arlequines, no hay criatura más impredecible ni peligrosa que el Solitario. Todas sus vidas son un espectáculo en el que el arte de la interpretación y el del asesinato se vuelven uno».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「我の兄弟というか、同胞というか…{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}と同様、彼はアシュリアンの御子らのひとりではない。陛下の同胞であるモン＝ケイは、彼のような人々をハーレクィンと呼んでいる。彼らは記憶であり、忘却だから。ハーレクィンたちの義務は、我らの種族と道は違えど、敵はただひとり…{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}かの渇きたる女{/g}であることを思い出させること。そして、ハーレクィンの中でもソリティアほど予測不能かつ危険な生物はいない。彼らの人生そのものが、パフォーマンスと殺しの芸術が絡み合った見世物なのだ」
languages.original_text: "My... brother? My kin? Like the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, he is not one of the Children of Asuryan. You mon-keigh call those like him Harlequins. For they are memory. They are oblivion. It is the Harlequins' duty to remind our kind that, despite our differing Paths, we have but one enemy — {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g}. And among the Harlequins, there is no creature more unpredictable or perilous than the Solitaire. Their entire lives are a spectacle where the art of performance and the art of killing are intertwined."

traits.locale_text: 「我の兄弟というか、同胞というか…{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}と同様、彼はアシュリアンの御子らのひとりではない。陛下の同胞であるモン＝ケイは、彼のような人々をハーレクィンと呼んでいる。彼らは記憶であり、忘却だから。ハーレクィンたちの義務は、我らの種族と道は違えど、敵はただひとり…{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}かの渇きたる女{/g}であることを思い出させること。そして、ハーレクィンの中でもソリティアほど予測不能かつ危険な生物はいない。彼らの人生そのものが、パフォーマンスと殺しの芸術が絡み合った見世物なのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Mein ... Bruder? Mein Verwandter? Wie die {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} ist er keines der Kinder von Asuryan. Ihr Chem-Pan-Sey nennt seinesgleichen Harlekine. Denn sie sind Erinnerung. Sie sind Vergessen. Es ist die Pflicht der Harlekine, Euresgleichen daran zu erinnern, dass wir trotz unserer unterschiedlichen Pfade nur einen Feind haben, denselben Feind: {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sie, die dürstet{/g}. Und unter den Harlekinen gibt es keine unberechenbarere oder gefährlichere Kreatur als den Solitär. Das gesamte Leben der Solitäre ist ein Spektakel, bei dem die Kunst der Darbietung und die Kunst des Tötens miteinander verwoben sind."
languages.original_text: "My... brother? My kin? Like the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, he is not one of the Children of Asuryan. You mon-keigh call those like him Harlequins. For they are memory. They are oblivion. It is the Harlequins' duty to remind our kind that, despite our differing Paths, we have but one enemy — {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g}. And among the Harlequins, there is no creature more unpredictable or perilous than the Solitaire. Their entire lives are a spectacle where the art of performance and the art of killing are intertwined."

traits.locale_text: "Mein ... Bruder? Mein Verwandter? Wie die {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} ist er keines der Kinder von Asuryan. Ihr Chem-Pan-Sey nennt seinesgleichen Harlekine. Denn sie sind Erinnerung. Sie sind Vergessen. Es ist die Pflicht der Harlekine, Euresgleichen daran zu erinnern, dass wir trotz unserer unterschiedlichen Pfade nur einen Feind haben, denselben Feind: {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sie, die dürstet{/g}. Und unter den Harlekinen gibt es keine unberechenbarere oder gefährlichere Kreatur als den Solitär. Das gesamte Leben der Solitäre ist ein Spektakel, bei dem die Kunst der Darbietung und die Kunst des Tötens miteinander verwoben sind."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Mon... frère ? Mon semblable ? Comme les {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukharis{/g}, il ne fait pas partie des enfants d'Asuryan. Les mon-keigh appellent ces individus des Arlequins, car ils sont la mémoire, ils sont l'oubli. Ils ont pour devoir de rappeler à notre peuple que même si nous suivons des Voies différentes, nous avons une ennemie commune : l'{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Assoiffée{/g}. Et parmi les Arlequins, aucune créature n'est plus imprévisible ou plus dangereuse que le solitaire. Sa vie entière est un spectacle dans lequel s'entremêlent l'art du théâtre et l'art de tuer. »
languages.original_text: "My... brother? My kin? Like the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, he is not one of the Children of Asuryan. You mon-keigh call those like him Harlequins. For they are memory. They are oblivion. It is the Harlequins' duty to remind our kind that, despite our differing Paths, we have but one enemy — {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g}. And among the Harlequins, there is no creature more unpredictable or perilous than the Solitaire. Their entire lives are a spectacle where the art of performance and the art of killing are intertwined."

traits.locale_text: « Mon... frère ? Mon semblable ? Comme les {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukharis{/g}, il ne fait pas partie des enfants d'Asuryan. Les mon-keigh appellent ces individus des arlequins, car ils sont la mémoire, ils sont l'oubli. Ils ont pour devoir de rappeler à notre peuple que même si nous suivons des Voies différentes, nous avons une ennemie commune : l'{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Assoiffée{/g}. Et parmi les arlequins, aucune créature n'est plus imprévisible ou plus dangereuse que le solitaire. Sa vie entière est un spectacle dans lequel s'entremêlent l'art du théâtre et l'art de tuer. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Kardeşim... Soydaşım... {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhariler{/g} gibi o da Asuryan'ın Çocuğu değil. Siz mon-keighler, onun gibilere Arleken dersiniz. Çünkü onlar, hem hatıralar hem de unutulmuşlukla birdir. Farklı Yollarda yürüsek de halkımın asıl düşmanının {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Susayan{/g} olduğunu hatırlatmak, Arleken'in vazifesidir. Arlekenler arasında da Kaçkınlar kadar tehlikelisi, öngörülemeyeni yoktur. Tüm hayatları, performans sanatı ile öldürme sanatının iç içe geçtiği bir gösteriden ibarettir."
languages.original_text: "My... brother? My kin? Like the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, he is not one of the Children of Asuryan. You mon-keigh call those like him Harlequins. For they are memory. They are oblivion. It is the Harlequins' duty to remind our kind that, despite our differing Paths, we have but one enemy — {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g}. And among the Harlequins, there is no creature more unpredictable or perilous than the Solitaire. Their entire lives are a spectacle where the art of performance and the art of killing are intertwined."

traits.locale_text: "Kardeşim... Soydaşım... {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} gibi o da Asuryan'ın Çocukları'ndan biri değil. Siz mon-keighler, onun gibilere Arleken dersiniz. Çünkü onlar, hem hatıralarla hem de unutulmuşlukla birdir. Farklı Yollardan yürüsek de halkıma asıl düşmanımızın {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Susayan{/g} olduğunu hatırlatmak, Arleken'in vazifesidir. Arlekenler arasında da Kaçkın kadar tehlikeli ve öngörülemeyeni bulunmaz. Tüm hayatları, performans sanatı ile öldürme sanatının iç içe geçtiği bir gösteriden ibarettir."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
